useCase.name: User research and testing for CMS Strategy

preconditions.precondition: CMS Strategy initiation requested by NSF Employee

mainSequence.step: Initiate request for CMS Strategy with the User Research Team
Analyze user data and recommend CMS features
Adjust recommendations based on technical input
Document high-level CMS strategy as per finalized recommendations
Receive CMS strategy documentation and review it
Request clarification on CMS strategy documentation
Initiate CMS implementation based on finalized strategy
